lines.text: They can't close our line, it's unthinkable
What about the old Canterbury-Whitstable line? They closed that.
Perhaps there were not men of sufficient faith in Canterbury.

[proposing a toast]
Our magnificent generals, General Gordon and General Booth.
Do you know what time it is?
Yes, yes, she'll run. She's as good as she ever was. I'll stake my living on it!
